ResourceHeader.ResourceName: IMP 8 Goddard Medium Energy (GME) 30-min energetic particle rates and fluxes

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: This CDAWeb-accessible data set contains 30-minute, spin-averaged count rates and fluxes, and their statistical uncertainties, of energetic particles from the IMP8 GME experiment. Included are fluxes of: protons in 30 energy bins from 0.88-1.15 to 327-485 MeV; alpha particles in 21 energy bins from 1.14-1.36 to 63.3-81.0 MeV/n; and 0.3-18 MeV electrons. Also included are count rates for each of 7 sensors and for 11 multi-sensor coincidence modes. Proton and alpha particle fluxes, for every other energy bin, are given at the FTPBrowser and MSSP interfaces identified below.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge Robert E. McGuire, the PI.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Subset, plot and list via CDAWeb; ASCII output option

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge Robert E. McGuire, the PI, and CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: FTPBrowser
AccessURL.Description: Subset, plot and list H and He fluxes

AccessURL.Name: Multi-Source Spectral Plot
AccessURL.Description: Spectral plots and power law fits for arbitrary durations for H and He fluxes

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge Robert E. McGuire, the PI, SPDF and the service used

Parameter.Name: Proton fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of protons, at 30-min resolution, in 30 energy bins ranging from 0.88-1.15 MeV to 327-485 MeV, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 30 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Alpha particle fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of alpha particles, at 30-min resolution, in 21 energy bins ranging from 1.14-1.36 MeV/n to 63.3-81.0 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 21 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Electron fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of 3-18 MeV electrons, at 30-min resolution, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of one flux and its corresponding uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Electron background fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes considered as background for 3-18 MeV electron flux, at 30-min resolution, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of one flux and its corresponding uncertainty
